titles.title: To redesignate the Miners Castle Information Station located near Munising, Michigan, as the "Raymond F. Clevenger Visitor Information Center at Miners Castle".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 9/25/2006--Introduced. Redesignates the Miners Castle Information Station, located near Munising, Michigan, as the "Raymond F. Clevenger Visitor Information Center at Miners Castle."
